title: Expense Tracker
description: Server-driven expense app using Java (Maven), Python services and REST APIs. Tracks, filters and exports data.

title: Aetherborn: Portal of Worlds
description: An immersive 3D fantasy RPG built with Unity. Features a mystical world, combat system, and atmospheric environments.

title: Phantom Trails
description: Fast-paced 3D action adventure game with combat mechanics and cinematic effects.

title: Payment System Web App
description: Payment System is a secure web app to send and request money, manage transactions, and handle admin tasks.

title: Traffic Rush Python Game
description: Traffic Rush is an adrenaline-pumping lane-based driving game where players dodge traffic, collect coins, and complete missions. Navigate challenging roads, unlock vehicles, and power up for endless high-speed fun.

title: First Aid Offline
description: FirstAid Pocket is an interactive desktop app that provides quick, easy-to-follow first-aid instructions for common injuries and emergencies.
